Title: 38875 - # Things to Consider When Thinking About the Smoking Age Limit
Direction: 500 words. In 3-6 subheadings, discuss why the current smoking age is set at its current limit and how the industry has evolved with the introduction of e-cigarettes. Give your reader bits of information that could help them form an opinion about whether or not 18 years old should be the age limit for smoking. Keep the topic in a positive light by talking about how the introduction of e-cigarettes has helped to limit nicotine intake, as well as the other benefits of vaping. You can link to the target URL when you discuss those benefits. The target audience is individuals who are interested in learning more about e-cigarettes. The article will be posted on a general blogging site that discusses a range of topics. Make sure to keep the topic of e-cigarettes in a positive light.
